name: ShineG In Bumpercat
detailed_description:
Author's message:

Hello.I am Louie,the producer of ShineG series.This is the sixth product of ShineG.

1.Thank you for your support.
2.I upgrade the game graphics.
3.I also design the new content of the game.

Game description:

Shine entered the world of catgirl by wearing a cat's hair band.And Shine started new battle.

1.This is an action game.You can attack your opponents by hitting and launching bombs.
You will win the game when all enemies fall into the sea.
2.The characters will wear swimsuits in this game.All characters are catgirls except Shine.(You can take photos when the characters are falling into the water.)
3.There are 40 maps in the game.Maps have different shapes and different items.
4.There are many weapons and items in game.

short_description: Shine entered the world of catgirl by wearing a cat's hair band.And Shine started new battle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 640 , AMD R7 240 , intel hd4600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 , Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 , AMD R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card

content_descriptors.notes: The character will wear a bikini.
